item.title: Idealo has developed a flight price comparison portal for India
item.description: Source: idealo India website. Idealo, a company specializing in price comparison, has expanded its services to India. With fourteen successful price comparison websites globally, idealo already helps numerous travelers find the best flight deals. The company proudly launched its fifteenth website,Â flights.idealo.in, in 2015. Indian customers can now compare prices on thousands of flights from various online travel agencies and airlines, all without any cost. Idealo’s platform features offers from both budget-friendly and high-end airlines, encompassing one-way and round-trip journeys.
